text: Gwarzo is a Local Government Area in Kano State, Nigeria. Its headquarters are in the town of Gwarzo. It has an area of 393 km² and a population of 183,987 at the 2006 census. The postal code of the area is 704. ==References== Category:Local Government Areas in Kano State Category:Populated places in Kano State
title: Gwarzo
